args.command: The name of the command you wish to get info about. Provides descriptions of all commands if not specified.

help.footer: Why are you searching for this?

node.desc: Pull info about our Teztools node from the status page.

steal.desc: Grab the image from a URL and add it to this server as an emoji.

args.name: Name to use for the emoji. Cannot contain whitespace.
args.url: URL to the image. Must point to a PNG, JPEG, or GIF.

reaction_roles.desc: Add or remove roles by reacting to a post by Harvey.
reaction_roles.footer: Requires an admin role to manage.

check.desc: Update the database, removing any reaction role posts that no longer exist. Then list all existing posts.
check.footer: Requires an admin role to use.

post.desc: Create a new reaction role post in the current channel.
post.footer: Requires an admin role to use.

add.desc: Add a new reaction role to all posts.

args.emoji: The emoji to use for the role. Use `:emoji:`

add.footer: Requires an admin role to use.

remove.desc: Remove all roles associated with an emoji from all posts

args.emoji: The emoji to remove from reaction roles. Use `:emoji:`

remove.footer: Requires an admin role to use.

log.desc: Set the logging channel for this server.
log.footer: Reaction role assignment/removal writes to this channel.

args.name: Name of the role. Multiple space-separated words can be used, though underscores are recommended.

create_role.footer: Requires an admin role to use.

fxhash_sales_feed.desc: Manage sales feed channels for sales on fxhash.

add.desc: Add a channel to the sales feed.

args.min_amount: Minimum amount (in êœ©) for a sale to be posted to this channel.

add.footer: This can be used to the `min_amount` for an existing sales feed channel.

remove.desc: Remove a channel from the sales feed.

list_channels.desc: List all sales feed channels in the current server and their `min_amount` values.
list_channels.footer: If no active channels exist, a simple notification will be posted.

start.footer: Requires an admin role to use.

stop.footer: Requires an admin role to use.
